ygData.subject: Re: Training points into research
ygData.msgSnippet: I would suggest putting in as many as you can.  You start off with some in it so you canonly do so many per lvl.  I found if I didnt max it out for that lvl I
ygData.messageBody:
I would suggest putting in as many as you can. You start off with some in
it so you canonly do so many per lvl. I found if I didnt max it out for
that lvl I failed mroe often than succeeded.

Shadiar J'Axx
22nd Wizard
Karana

----- Original Message -----
From: MAD Iguana <wargod@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 3:50 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Training points into research


> From: MAD Iguana <wargod@...>
>
> I am currently lvl 15 and since I will be getting research soon I was
> wondering how many practice points I should put into it? I have about
> 25-30 saved up so far.
>
>
